attributes.action: Police officers should be high priority for vaccine due to high risk job.
attributes.additional_details:
Police officers deserve safety and peace of mind like other key workers. 
Police officers are likely to be super spreaders of Covid because the job is so high risk coming into contact with members of public, victims, witnesses and suspects in custody. It’s the decent thing to do in order to safeguard police but also the public.
attributes.background:
Just like other key workers/ essential workers police should be high priority for the vaccine. 
Police officers can’t work remotely and have contact with people on a regular basis. 
Daily police officers come into so much contact with people and over this pandemic in contact with many Covid risks.
